Instance.description: A collection of UI data for an Aspiration Category.

Tunable.name: display_text
Tunable.description: The Aspiration Category's name within the UI.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon to be displayed in the panel view.

Tunable.name: is_sim_info_panel
Tunable.description: If checked then this Category will be marked for the Sim Info panel rather than for the Aspiration panel.

Tunable.name: ui_sort_order
Tunable.description: Order in which this category is sorted against other categories in the UI. If two categories share the same sort order, undefined behavior will ensue.

TunableList.name: used_by_packs
TunableList.description: Optional set of packs which utilize this category. Used for excluding categories from the UI if their tuning resides in base game. (It is preferred to place category tuning in the appropriate pack, if possible.)
